name: BLUES NEW ADVENTURE: SEPARTED FRO MTHE PACK
name_original: BLUES NEW ADVENTURE: SEPARTED FRO MTHE PACK
description:
OH NO ON RETRO ISLAND BLUE HAS LOST HIS PACK HE MUST FIND HIS PACK AND SAVE IT FROM THOSE EVIL BUGS

IF YOU DIE PRESS THE EQAUL OR PLUS KEY TO RETRY

IF YOU WANT TO KILL THE BUGS PRESS W TO BREIFLY KICK
